MerchAccPaymentMethodType.name: MerchAccPaymentMethodType
MerchAccPaymentMethodType.description: Refers to a payment method that is in a payment method set, which is defined by the MerchAccPaymentMethodSet object.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only when the multicurrency feature is enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency used by the org.

PaymentInstrumentType.description: The type of instrument the payer can pay with.

SortOrder.description: Sort order for the MechAccPaymentMethodType within the MerchAccPaymentMethodSetExperience.
